summary: A Qiskit plugin that implements the Solovay‑Kitaev algorithm to approximate arbitrary unitary operations with a discrete set of basis gates during circuit transpilation. It allows users to configure the basis approximations, gate set, approximation depth, and recursion level.
business_intent: Enable quantum compiler users to generate hardware‑compatible gate sequences for any unitary by providing a customizable, high‑fidelity approximation mechanism, improving circuit portability and execution efficiency on target quantum devices.
